comment: As of this morning, the UK has tested 10,483 people for COVID-19/SARS-CoV-2, and the US has tested 459?That cant be right, surely? Are these numbers reasonably comparable?https://t.co/0bTO9FWEYkhttps://t.co/p2IxRHgr2T
(The low test rates for the US appear to have come from a problem with US-specific test kits, and the bureaucratic approvals needed for non-CDC labs to use a workaround. https://t.co/feNU4sM1Kh )
